attributes.action: make incentives for BA Hons Primary Education students equal to those training for a PGCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, PGCE students have the incentive of a bursary of between £6000 to £9000 during their PGCE year however, no such bursaries are available to students taking the 3/4 year BA Honours Primary Education course.  Other incentives e.g. 'Golden handshake' are also not available to such students.  Another petition is being supported by the NUT at this time.
